Name: AQRA Tenses [Learn English]
About the game: Having trouble with English tenses? This game is specially designed to improve your memory in a short time. The game concept focuses on developing users' memory in new ways that bring equal amounts of fun and knowledge. Without mentioning the rules of English grammar, this game is designed to help people learn grammar with less stress. In addition, there is a gift in the game, 14 levels of our next game for children and beginners (AQRA Steps) for learning English. The gift is currently only available in 14 languages (Arabic, Turkish, German, Dutch, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese, Spanish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Italian, Danish and French), I hope you like it and recommend it to your child or friend. Special thanks to UPBGE and GIMP.
